metadata.title: CVE-2017-17046 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x on the ARM platform allowingguest OS users to obtain sensitive information from DRAM after a reboot,because disjoint blocks, and physical addresses that do not start at zero,are mishandled.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
